name: DiceRoller - DungeonCrawler
description:
A small puzzle game made for GMTK Jam 2022.

Its a bit buggy so if something dont work alright you can restart level.

My discord server: https://discord.gg/QJdyWSWbBz

Controls:

WASD - movement

Hold LEFT mouse button over the Dice to change activate inspection mode

RIGHT mouse button to leave inspection mode

Roll the Dice by pressing left mouse button in inspection mode

Change Dice parts by holding LEFT mouse button

Game was made completely from scratch for GMTK Jam 2022 by me except the sfx, that was made by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/

Special thanks to my two friends for ideas and brainstorming with me
